name: Memory-Go-Round Ticket
description: Grants you one ride on the Memory-Go-Round. Reinforce your knowledge as it spins, ensuring no memory gets left behind.

name: Echo Stage Ticket
description: Your 3-minute pass to the Echo Stage. Step into the spotlight and let your voice resonate, practicing clarity and commanding presence.

name: Oracle's Booth Ticket
description: A ticket for a 3-minute consultation at the Oracle's Booth. Ask your questions and see what revelations the Aetheric data-stream unveils.

description: Grants 3 minutes of access to the Tranquil Garden, a pocket dimension of serenity perfect for quiet reflection and reinforcing your inner harmony.

description: Your entry pass to the ever-changing Inspiration Hall. Spend 3 minutes gazing upon a cascade of concepts and aesthetic patterns.
